blocks.name: clsi
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the liminf function. (actually, it makes sense for any extended real function defined on a subset of RR which is not upper-bounded)
blocks.origin: const class clsi { liminf }

blocks.content: Define the inferior limit of a sequence of extended real numbers. (Contributed by GS, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: limsuplt2
blocks.content: The defining property of the superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

thm limsuplt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(clsp, c0), clt, c1), wrex(s0, cr, wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wbr(cfv(clsp, c0), clt, c1), wrex(s0, cr, wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1)), wrex(hs0, cr, wbr(cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0)), clt, c1)), wrex(hs0, cr, wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(cfv(clsp, c0), clt, c1), wrex(hs0, cr, wbr(cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0)), clt, c1))), wss(c2, cr), wf(c0, c2, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  limsuplt(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c1, cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  rexbidva(hs0, cr, w0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0)), clt, c1), wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1))
  breq1d(cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0)), clt, c1, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  fvmptd3(hs1, cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0), csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  supeq1d(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt, cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  ineq1d(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr, cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  imaeq2d(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), universe))
  supex(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  a1i(w0, wb(wrex(hs0, cr, wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1)), wrex(s0, cr, wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1))))
  cbvrexv(hs0, s0, cr, wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1), wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1))
  breq1d(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  supeq1d(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt, cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  ineq1d(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  imaeq2d(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cico, cpnf)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, csup(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), clt, c1)
  diff.csup.s(s0, cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)
  diff.cin.s(s0, cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
}

thm liminfgord(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr))), wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr))), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr))
  sselda(cv(hs0), cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)), wss(co(c1, cico, cpnf), co(c0, cico, cpnf)), wss(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wss(co(c1, cico, cpnf), co(c0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  ixxss1(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, cle, c1, cico, cpnf, cico, cle, clt, cle)
  df-ico(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  xrletr(c0, c1, cv(hs3))
  imass2(co(c1, cico, cpnf), co(c0, cico, cpnf), c2)
  ssrin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr)
  infxrlb(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cv(hs0))
  mp2an(wb(wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wral(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), wbr(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cle, cv(hs0)))), wss(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr), wcel(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cxr))
  inss2(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr)

  infxrcl(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr))
  infxrgelb(hs0, cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

  diff.hs2.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs2.c(cle)

  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(cle)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(cico)
  diff.hs3.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cima(c2, co(c1, cico, cpnf)), cxr))
  diff.hs0.c(cinf(cin(cima(c2, co(c0, cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))
}

blocks.name: limsupvald
blocks.content: The superior limit of a sequence ` F ` of extended real numbers is the infimum of the set of suprema of all restrictions of ` F ` to an upperset of reals . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: limsupresicompt
blocks.content: The superior limit doesn't change when a function is restricted to the upper part of the reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupresicompt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtr3d(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1)), cfv(clsp, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2)), w0)
  limsupresico(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c4, universe, w0)
  mptexd(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  fveq2d(clsp, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1)))
  resmpt3(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(limsup `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))=(limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c2)‚Ü¶ c1)))

thm liminfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(clsi, c0), csup(crn(c2), cxr, clt)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmptd3(hs0, clsi, c0, csup(crn(c2), cxr, clt), universe, csup(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt), universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  df-liminf(hs0, s0)
  supeq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), cxr, clt, crn(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqtr4d(cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), c2, cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq2dv(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  infeq1d(cin(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt, cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  ineq1d(cima(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr, cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cr, cinf(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))))
  elex(c0, c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csup(crn(c2), cxr, clt), universe))
  supex(crn(c2), cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  a1i(hs0 = c0, c2 =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ inf(((c0 "(s0[[,)]+‚àû))‚ãÇ ‚Ñù*), ‚Ñù*, <)))

blocks.name: climlimsup
blocks.content: A sequence of real numbers converges if and only if it converges to its superior limit. The first hypothesis is needed (see ~ climlimsupcex for a counterexample) (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm climlimsup(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)))
  caurcvg(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wf(c0, c2, cr))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(hs2, c2, wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(hs2)))), clt, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, cz))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  climcau(hs0, hs2, hs1, c1, c0, c2)
  adantl(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  mpan(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wrel(cli))
  climrel()
  releldm(cli, c0, cfv(clsp, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà dom(~~>)‚Üî c0[~~>](limsup ` c0)))

  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)

blocks.name: limsupge
blocks.content: The defining property of the superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupge(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c0, cle, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(s0, cr, wbr(c0, cle, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), wral(hs0, cr, wbr(c0, cle, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))))
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(hs0, cr, wbr(c0, cle, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt))), wral(hs0, cr, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cle, cfv(clsp, c1)), wral(hs0, cr, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0))))), wss(c2, cr), wf(c1, c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  limsuple(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c0, cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  ralbidva(hs0, cr, w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, cle, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  breq2d(c0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0)), csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  fvmptd3(hs1, cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), cv(hs0), csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, cr, csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)))
  supeq1d(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt, cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  ineq1d(cima(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf)), cxr, cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  imaeq2d(c1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(csup(cin(cima(c1, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt), universe))

blocks.name: liminfresxr
blocks.content: The inferior limit of a function only depends on the preimage of the extended real part. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: climlimsupcex
blocks.content: Counterexample for ~ climlimsup , showing that the first hypothesis is needed, if the empty set is a complex number (see ~ 0ncn and its comment) (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm climlimsupcex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc))), w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wn(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)))))
  -| wn(wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, emptycls)
} = {
  3jca(wa(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc))), wf(c0, c1, cr), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wn(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0))))
  a1i(wa(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc))), wf(c0, c1, cr))
  mpbir(wf(c0, c1, cr), wf(emptycls, emptycls, cr))
  f0(cr)
  feq12i(c0, c1, cr, emptycls, emptycls)
  eqtri(c1, emptycls, cfv(cuz, c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cuz, c2), emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cz)))
  uz0(c2)
  adantr(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  syl2anc(wcel(emptycls, cc), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wrel(cli), wbr(c0, cli, emptycls))
  a1i(wcel(emptycls, cc), wrel(cli))

  syl5eqbr(c0, cli, emptycls, emptycls, wcel(emptycls, cc))
  releldm(cli, c0, emptycls)
  pm2.65da(wa(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc))), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls))
  adantlr(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(emptycls, cc), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls))
  0cnv()
  pm2.65da(wa(wa(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc))), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0))), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cmnf))
  adantll(wa(wcel(emptycls, cc), wn(wcel(cmnf, cc))), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls), wceq(emptycls, cmnf))
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls)), wceq(emptycls, cmnf), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls), wbr(emptycls, cli, cmnf))
  simpr(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, emptycls), wbr(emptycls, cli, cmnf))
  biimpi(wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)), wbr(emptycls, cli, cmnf))
  breq12i(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0), emptycls, cmnf)
  eqtri(cfv(clsp, c0), cmnf, cfv(clsp, emptycls))
  fveq2i(clsp, c0, emptycls)
  limsup0()
  climuni(emptycls, emptycls, cmnf)

  nelneq(emptycls, cc, cmnf)
}

blocks.name: liminflelimsup
blocks.content: The superior limit is greater than or equal to the inferior limit. The second hypothesis is needed (see ~ liminflelimsupcex for a counterexample). The inequality can be strict, see ~ liminfltlimsupex . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm liminflelimsup(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(clsi, c0), cle, cfv(clsp, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cr, wrex(s1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  liminflelimsuplem(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, w0)
  sylib(w0, wral(hs1, cr, wrex(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls))), wral(s0, cr, wrex(s1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls))))
  cbvral(s0, hs1, cr, wrex(s1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)), wrex(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)))
  nfv(hs1, wrex(s1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)))
  nfv(s0, wrex(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), wrex(s1, co(cv(s0), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)), wrex(hs0, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(hs0), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)), wrex(s1, co(cv(hs1), cico, cpnf), wne(cin(cima(c0, co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), cxr), emptycls)))

blocks.name: limsupgtlem
blocks.content: For any positive real, the superior limit of F is larger than any of its values at large enough arguments, up to that positive real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: limsupgt
blocks.content: Given a sequence of real numbers, there exists an upper part of the sequence that's appxoximated from below by the superior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm limsupgt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))), wrex(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))))
  limsupgtlem(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  cbvrexv(hs1, s0, c0, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wb(wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))))
  cbvral(hs0, s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))
  nfbr(s1, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))
  nfov(s1, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2)
  nffv(s1, c1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s1, cmin)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, clt)
  nffv(s1, clsp, c1)
  nfcv(s1, clsp)
  nfv(hs0, wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))
  breq1d(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1), co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c1)
  raleqdv(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s0), cuz)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1))))
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, c1)))

blocks.name: liminfresuz
blocks.content: If the real part of the domain of a function is a subset of the integers, the inferior limit doesn't change when the function is restricted to an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm liminfresuz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(clsi, cres(c0, c1)), cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr)), cfv(clsi, cres(c0, cr)), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr)), cfv(clsi, cres(c0, cr)), cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr)), cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1))))
  fveq2i(clsi, cres(cres(c0, c1), cr), cres(cres(c0, cr), c1))
  rescom(c0, c1, cr)
  eqtrd(cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1)), cfv(clsi, cres(c0, cr)), cfv(clsi, cres(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf))), w0)
  fveq2d(clsi, cres(cres(c0, cr), c1), cres(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), w0)
  3eqtrrd(cres(cres(c0, cr), c1), cres(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), co(c2, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(c0, cr), cin(cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf))), w0)
  reseq1d(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf), cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), w0)
  eqcomd(cres(c0, cr), cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cres(cres(c0, cr), cz), cres(c0, cr)), wrel(cres(c0, cr)), wss(cdm(cres(c0, cr)), cz))
  a1i(w0, wrel(cres(c0, cr)))

  eqcomd(cin(cz, co(c2, cico, cpnf)), c1, w0)
  uzinico(c1, c2, w0)
  liminfresico(cres(c0, cr), co(c2, cico, cpnf), c2, universe, w0)
  zred(c2, w0)
  eqid(co(c2, cico, cpnf))
  resexd(c0, cr, c3, w0)
  liminfresre(cres(c0, c1), universe, w0)
  resexd(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  liminfresre(c0, c3, w0)
}

thm liminfvalxrmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

blocks.name: liminfresuz2

thm liminfvaluz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsi, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(c1))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  liminfval3(s0, c0, c1, universe, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  fvexi(c0, cuz, c2)
  zred(c2, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eleqtrd(cv(s0), c0, cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf)))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf))), wceq(cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf)), c0))
  eqcomd(cin(c0, co(c2, cico, cpnf)), c0, w0)
  uzinico3(c0, c2, w0)
}

thm limsupval4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxne(cfv(clsi, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(c1))))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxne(cfv(clsi, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(c1)))), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), cxne(cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)))), w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), cxne(cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)))), w0)
  xnegnegd(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), cxr))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), cxr), wcel(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1), universe))
  mptex(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)
  inex2(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf))
  ovex(c3, cico, cpnf)
  limsupcl(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1), universe)
  limsupresicompt(s0, c0, c1, co(c3, cico, cpnf), c2, c3, w0)
  xnegeqd(cfv(clsi, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(c1))), cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1))), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(clsi, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(c1))), cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1))), cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(cxne(c1))))), w0)
  liminfval3(s0, c0, cxne(c1), c2, c3, w0)
  xnegcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)))))
  xnegeqd(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(cxne(c1)))), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, c0, cxne(cxne(c1)))), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1)), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), cxne(cxne(c1)))), w0)
  limsupresicompt(s0, c0, cxne(cxne(c1)), co(c3, cico, cpnf), c2, c3, w0)
  eqid(co(c3, cico, cpnf))
  fveq2d(clsp, cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), cxne(cxne(c1))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), c1), w0)
  mpteq2da(s0, cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)), cxne(cxne(c1)), c1, w0)
  xnegnegd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf)))))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, co(c3, cico, cpnf))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cico, cpnf)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
}

thm limsupval4(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(limsup `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))= -e((liminf `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(c1)))))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû)))‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((limsup `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)), -e((liminf `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(c1)))), (limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)), -e(-e((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)))), w0)
  eqcomd((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)), -e(-e((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)))), w0)
  xnegnegd((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, (limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  ax-mp((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*, (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà ùïå)
  mptex(s0, (c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû)), c1)
  inex2(c0, (c3[[,)]+‚àû))
  ovex(c3, cico, cpnf)
  limsupcl((s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1), universe)
  limsupresicompt(s0, c0, c1, (c3[[,)]+‚àû), c2, c3, w0)
  xnegeqd((liminf `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(c1))), -e((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1))), w0)
  eqtrd((liminf `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(c1))), -e((limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1))), -e((limsup `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(-e(c1))))), w0)
  liminfval3(s0, c0, -e(c1), c2, c3, w0)
  xnegcld(c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))))
  xnegeqd((limsup `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(-e(c1)))), (limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)), w0)
  eqtrd((limsup `(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ -e(-e(c1)))), (limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1)), (limsup `(s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ -e(-e(c1)))), w0)
  limsupresicompt(s0, c0, -e(-e(c1)), (c3[[,)]+‚àû), c2, c3, w0)
  eqid((c3[[,)]+‚àû))
  fveq2d(clsp, (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ -e(-e(c1))), (s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))‚Ü¶ c1), w0)
  mpteq2da(s0, (c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû)), -e(-e(c1)), c1, w0)
  xnegnegd(c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c3[[,)]+‚àû))))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, (c3[[,)]+‚àû))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cico, cpnf)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)

blocks.name: liminfreuzlem
blocks.content: Given a function on the reals, its inferior limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is greater than or equal to the function, infinitely often; 2. there is a real number that is smaller than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

  bitrd(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cr), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))), wcel(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s2, c1, cneg(cfv(c0, cv(s2))))), cr))
  bitr4d(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cr), wcel(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s2, c1, cneg(cfv(c0, cv(s2))))), cr), wcel(cxne(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s2, c1, cneg(cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))), cr))

blocks.name: liminfreuz
blocks.content: Given a function on the reals, its inferior limit is real if and only if two condition holds: 1. there is a real number that is greater than or equal to the function, infinitely often; 2. there is a real number that is smaller than or equal to the function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm liminfreuz(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cr), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s2))))))))
  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c0), cr), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))), wa(wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs2, c1, wrex(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  liminfreuzlem(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  nfcv(hs0, c0)
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs2, c1, wrex(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c1, wrex(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c1, wbr(cv(s0), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s2))))))))

blocks.name: liminfltlem
blocks.content: Given a sequence of real numbers, there exists an upper part of the sequence that's approximated from above by the inferior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm liminfltlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(clsi, c1), clt, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), caddc, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(clsi, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(clsi, c1), clt, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), caddc, c2)))), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(co(cfv(cmpt(s1, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), cv(s1)), cmin, c2), clt, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))))))
  limsupgt(s0, s1, c0, cmpt(s1, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), c2, c3, w0)
  nfmpt1(s1, c0, cneg(cfv(c1, cv(s1))))

blocks.name: liminflt
blocks.content: Given a sequence of real numbers, there exists an upper part of the sequence that's approximated from above by the inferior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: climliminf
blocks.content: A sequence of real numbers converges if and only if it converges to its inferior limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm climliminf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsi, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsi, c0)))
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, cfv(clsi, c0), cfv(clsp, c0), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  imp(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)))
  biimpd(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsp, c0)))
  climlimsup(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  climliminflimsupd(c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)), wf(c0, c2, cr))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  adantl(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(clsi, c0)), wcel(c0, cdm(cli)))
  releldmi(c0, cli, cfv(clsi, c0))
  climrel()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climliminf(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà dom(~~>)‚Üî c0[~~>](liminf ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>), c0[~~>](liminf ` c0))
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, (liminf ` c0), (limsup ` c0), (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà dom(~~>)))
  imp(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>), c0[~~>](limsup ` c0))
  biimpd(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>), c0[~~>](limsup ` c0))
  climlimsup(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  climliminflimsupd(c0, c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß c0 ‚àà dom(~~>)))
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñ§)
  adantr(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>), (c0 : c2 ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  simpr(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(~~>))
  adantl(w0, c0[~~>](liminf ` c0), c0 ‚àà dom(~~>))
  releldmi(c0, cli, (liminf ` c0))
  climrel()
}

blocks.name: liminflbuz2
blocks.content: A sequence with values in the extended reals, and with liminf that is not ` -oo ` , is eventually greater than ` -oo ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm liminflbuz2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cxr))
  -| wi(w0, wne(cfv(clsi, c1), cmnf))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  reximddv3(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf)))
  imp(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf)), wral(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  ralimdaa(s1, cfv(cuz, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cuz, cv(s0)))), wi(wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))
  condan(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf)), wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf))
  adantlr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wceq(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmnf))
  mpbid(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmnf), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cmnf))
  xrnltled(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmnf, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wb(wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cmnf), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmnf)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cxr))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cxr))
  xlemnf(cfv(c1, cv(s1)))
  syl6eq(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf, cxne(cmnf), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmnf))
  xnegeq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmnf)
  xnegmnf()
  ad2antlr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf), wn(wbr(cmnf, clt, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wn(wceq(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf)))
  neneq(cxne(cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cpnf)

blocks.name: liminfpnfuz
blocks.content: The inferior limit of a function is ` +oo ` if and only if every real number is the lower bound of the restriction of the function to a set of upper integers. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Apr-2023.)

  -| wnfc(s2, c0)
